name: Labyrinth Master, Chronos
text:
Continuous: If a player would draw one or more cards, that player draws that many plus one cards instead. This ability is applied to all players. (For example, if you would draw two cards, draw three cards instead. You don't draw one card for each of the cards you draw. This ability won't be applied for the cards drawn by this ability.)
Continuous: Whenever a resonator in a field is put into a player's hand, that player puts top card of his or her main deck into his or her graveyard. This ability is applied to all players.
Activate. Pay <div class="fdb-icon-free">
0
